headline: Middle-income consumers hurting most from tariffs. Here's why.
summary: It's a tale of two retailers as Macy's (M) and Dollar Tree (DLTR) shares go in opposite directions despite topping their second quarter earnings estimates and raising guidance. Innovator Capital Management chief investment strategist Tim Urbanowicz weighs in on the state of the US consumer amid the Trump administration's ongoing tariffs. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
